name: RlsLog.net Dark 2021
description:
Light-weight dark theme for the rlslog.net website, including ad-suppression.
Using a dedicated ad-blocker for this site is still strongly recommendable as it's known to include malicous/deceiving/mining ads.
additional_info: v1.13 • Updated Ad-suppression. v1.12 • Picked a slightly darker background-colour. v1.11 • Override the inline 'text-align: center' styles that popped up recently on some articles. This seems to be an unintended copy & paste error on the website, but we 'fix' it either way • Updated the theme name to 2020 to reflect it's still current & recent v1.10 • Added a slight gradient to the sidebar background • Lightened comment text color v1.01 • Improved popup-blocking and more aggressive ad-suppression • Changed link-color to a matching blue instead of the default dark-red • Maximized width of article text and images to a 100% • Suppressed the custom bullet-image for list-items styles for a cleaner look
